website_summaries.verdict: A durable, heavy-duty rake head that's strong and versatile, allowing this product to excel in many applications.
pros: Sturdy, wide, curved teeth can be pulled through soil or gravel with ease
Flat-top design facilitates leveling of seed beds
cons: Doesn't come with a handle, which must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by this item's description!!!
customer_reviews.text: This rake's description does not mention that it does not come with a handle; you have to buy the handle separately @ $10.81 to be able to use this PART to make it functional. It is just an accessory in the Lefhheit system. I did not see anywhere in this product description that you had to buy the handle separately. Most people assume that they are buying a rake with a handle; wrong!!! The quality of the rake is very good but who needs a rake without a handle. :-( ;-( :-(
customer_reviews.author: PAUL R FONTENOT

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for general garden work
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice sized take head for my mid size garden use. I am getting older and was looking for an efficient rake, sized to allow me to work without stressing my shoulders. There are larger rake heads but I found this size to be perfectly balanced in size and functionality with out experiencing any shoulder pain due to pushing / pulling larger quantities of dirt. This rake head is very manageable and as with all Wolf-garten products flawless in construction/ fit and finish. Used the wooden handle for the first time this weekend and have to say the wooden handle adds a nice feel to the rake head.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: High quality product that will last years.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the WOLF-Garten products. I have had one of the handles and a couple of the accessories for about 15 years, and they are still in great condition and used regularly. So happy that Amazon carries some of the accessories. The rake head will snap on to the handle securely. I bought this, along with a handle, as a gift for a friend. She loves the products, too!
customer_reviews.author: gamekat

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The ability to change out the tools was one of the factors in my choice as well as all of the great reviews. I used it to break up the soil and remove the weeds and existing grass in my back yard (small yard - 500 sq. ft). It was pretty easy to help level out bumps, etc. My only complaint is that when you snap the rake onto the handle - I have the 59" metal one - there's a bit of wiggle on it, as in it's not a perfectly tight fit. It didn't affect the use of it. I haven't tried and of the other attachments yet so I don't know how tightly they snap on.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: As Always A Great Product :)
customer_reviews.text: As always a great products from Wolf. Keep up the great work guys, I have many of your product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ray

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable rake.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, little garden rake. The whole rake is extremely strong, sturdy, and well made, with the tines being especially strong and even a little sharp at the ends. So, be careful not to poke yourself or anybody else with the points of this rake as it is a lot stronger than your skin or your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Truthteller

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but the rake head wobbles some
customer_reviews.text: The interchangeable attachment concept is great, and I like that it is constructed of aluminum and will not rust. However, the rake head wobbles around a little bit in the mount making feel un-sturdy. Also, other attachments seem to be on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Lower price and better quality than I could find at local stores! Sturdy enough to rake gravel and designed well enough to level the soil in my new raised beds. Highly recommended. Notice: just as in the picture, it does not come with a handle, so you either need to order a handle separately or have one ready at home. I had the handle from my old rake. This rake head tapped right into place and held fast on the old handle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy duty! Wondered a couple things when I purchased - would it clip onto the pole tightly to be used as a heavy duty rake and would it have the sturdiness to be used in hard dirt. Both were a definite yes as this thing works as well (better actually) than any rake I've used previously! Will definitely go back to Wolf-Garten attachments in the future
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Rigid sturdy bow rake.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bow rake. High quality with quick connect to the long handle.
customer_reviews.author: J D down south

customer_reviews.title: Wolf-Garten Bow rake
customer_reviews.text: Again-really like this and how it works. Had one for years until I backed over it. This was a replacement. One thing to remember is not to leave it in the garden as dirt gets inside and it is hard to pull off the handle to change attachments. Well worth the price. We have the hoe, leaf rake- cultivators and many other attachments. Best tool ever made
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine

customer_reviews.title: Best Garden Tools EVER!
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed with this or any other Wolf Garten tool. We love them. We have several different pieces, and handles. They are durable, flexible - and make gardening a pleasure. We have 2 acres, a large vegetable garden, 50 or so rose bushes, and several fruit trees - so they get a lot of use around here.
customer_reviews.author: Phantomdach

customer_reviews.title: I have the aluminum handle and it locks in nicely. I highly recommend the WOLF-Garten Bow rake
customer_reviews.text: A very solid rake with quality materials. I have used it for about 10 hours so far on rough areas with lots of roots catching and pulling. No problems. It also works very well on grass areas to pull up dead/cut grass and weeds. I have the aluminum handle and it locks in nicely. I highly recommend the WOLF-Garten Bow rake.
customer_reviews.author: matto

customer_reviews.title: best rake ever!
customer_reviews.text: The rake is sturdy and well made, and the idea of interchangeable handles is genius. I bought it to spread around some gravel, which it does with ease, but I also use it to rake leaves. The raked leaves come off easily.I look forward to purchasing more Wolf-Garten products.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly0807

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality even though I missed the part having to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality even though I missed the part having to order the handle also, but the reviews gave this company good reviews on quality and from what I see I'm not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent rake head
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent rake head. I've used it in last years grass/weeds. It is tough and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Again, love the versatility and sturdiness of the WOLF-Garten utensils. This rake is TOUGH. Have been cleaning up a garbage pile of broken glass, cans, etc. and the tines are perfect for getting the chunks while leaving behind the sand.
customer_reviews.author: B&B Krolls

customer_reviews.title: No handle
customer_reviews.text: Handle was extra and did not come with the rake Approx cost for this rake with handle Was about 50$ I did not want any of there other attachments Teturnef
customer_reviews.author: WMB

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this brand for years. Great garden tools.
customer_reviews.author: L. V.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy rake, lightweight handle.
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy-weight rake head, but it fits rather loosely into the long handle and I'm afraid it will break if I push on it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gardening tools for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Wolf-Garten has my loyalty and thanks for being available, with all their products All are very cost effective and durable. Very easy to change handles and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A Short

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but, worth it. Quality made.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of the handle and the rake, $50.00, it does work well, and I well made. Its holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is top quality, cost no more than common tools, You can't go wrong with this system.........notice that handles are sepa​rate.
customer_reviews.author: Charles V. Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as is the entire Wolf-Garten system of tools. Very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Machacek

customer_reviews.title: Slope clearing
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30 foot slope to clear each year. This tool and the extension handle made it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Angelis

customer_reviews.title: The removable handle makes this a very unstable rack. ...
customer_reviews.text: The removable handle makes this a very unstable rack. It did not hold up very well when I tried to turn our heavy clay soil.
customer_reviews.author: hank43

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, but...
customer_reviews.text: This Wolf product is high-end and seems like it will last for years. But...you need to buy the handle in addition to buying the rake portion -- which can be costly.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Not a good comb.
customer_reviews.text: I thought "Hey, I have a lot of really long hair. You know what would help me keep it in line? A bow rake." So what did I do? I went and bought a bow rake from Amazon. The WOLF-Garten Bow Rake 1647004 could not rake a bow, or the hair it holds. This must be for some other purpose, as it is much too large to be for human hair. Like.. Whoa. Way too large. It would have taken two tall people to comb my hair with this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Don't Be Fooled
customer_reviews.text: Look twice, this purchase is for the rake head only. I bought this as a gift for my father, I couldn't believe the pole didn't come with it. I had to turn right and spend more money for the pole than the rake cost. Very embarrassing. Contract law requires a meeting of the minds. This is a very misleading, unprofessional ad. It should be removed.
customer_reviews.author: kelly w rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perrfect addition of wolf garden tools to my already owned wolf items, garden tools that last forever
customer_reviews.author: Ethel D. Chavis

customer_reviews.title: WOLFGARTEN
customer_reviews.text: Wolfgarten makes good attachments but awful long handles. The short handles are ok. The long ones will fatigue and break at the button hole. Then you have to make a handle to use the attachment. That being said I use this rake in my garden a lot. It's just the right width. Not so wide as to be a pain to use but wide enough to be efficient. Your mileage may vary. Heads up on the long handles.
customer_reviews.author: IMHOTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Wolf Garten Bow Rake
customer_reviews.text: I have a whole collection of the Wolf Garten products and have yet to be dissapointed. Sturdy, effective tools with interchangeable handles that work. The only downside is they are next to impossible to find at the local retailers so selection is limited to none. Thanks goodness for the Internet and Amazon. Too heavy for leaf raking but wonderful in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Stroman

customer_reviews.title: The System works great
customer_reviews.text: The Wolf Garten tools are quality and sturdy. They all securely click into one handle (bought separately, but not expensive) I have had these tools for two years - storage is great - you can find a hanger made for them and you only have one handle. There is a short handle available too, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Garden rake attachment
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality rake attachment. Hardened steel with a treated finish that is much better than a standard rake you can buy off the shelf. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorboy!

product_meta.title: WOLF-Garten Bow Rake 1647004
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM
The WOLF-Garten bow rake allows gardener's to quickly change tools in one-click, eliminates the need for having a garage full of unsightly, and space consuming long-handled tools. This bow rake has a high quality 13.8-inch steel head, with wide curved teeth which can be pulled through soil or gravel smoothly and easily. Designed for ease of use the flat top design allows for leveling seed beds or gravel, while the bow shape adds strength and stability.
feature_bullets: Bow rake delivers strength and stability
Widecurved teeth pull through soil or gravel smoothly and easily
Flat top design allows for leveling seed beds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars50 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
